src:
EVROLIGAŠKI TIKET 01: Navijaj za Žocov Fener na kvoti 8,00
Vreme curi... Ovaj sjajan listić dostupan je do 18.00 časova

01 Nov 2019

Krajnje je vreme da se košarkaška mašinerija našeg Željka Obradovića podigne i ispliva u evroligaškom grotlu. Veruješ li da Želgiris nema šanse, da Turci igraju 1-1, da Baskonija isto priređuje Bajernu? Smatraš li da Armejci protiv Zenita lagano igraju za dvojku, te da Real Madrid može do duple pobede protiv Albe. Ako sve to misliš, onda nema razloga dalje ni da čitaš ovaj članak. Za tebe je EVROLIGAŠKI TIKET 01.


18.00: (3,05) ZENIT (15,0) CSKA (1,45)



18.45: (1,25) FENERBAHČE (17,0) ŽALGIRIS (4,40)



21.00: (1,15) BASKONIJA (15,0) BAJERN (3,05)



21.00: (1,17) REAL MADRID (20,0) ALBA (5,50)


Požuri, jer do 18.00 časova možeš sebe da obraduješ ovim tiketom u najbližem MOZZARTU, ili da ga obezbediš putem mozzartbet.com aplikacije. Izbor je na tebi, zato ne oklevaj – DONESI EVROLIGAŠKU ODLUKU!





* Kvote su podložne promenama
text:
EUROLEAGUE TICKET 01: Fan for Zoc's Fener at 8.00
Time is leaking ... This great ticket is available by 6pm

01 Nov 2019

It is high time for our Željko Obradović's basketball machinery to be erected and floated in the Euroleague hatch. Do you believe that the Jelgiris have no chance, that the Turks play 1-1, that Basque Country also arrange Bayern Munich? Do you think the Armenians against Zenit play lightly for two, and that Real Madrid can double win against Alba. If you think all that, then there's no reason to read this article further. For you, it's the EUROLIGUE TICKET 01.


18.00: (3.05) ZENIT (15.0) CSKA (1.45)



18.45: (1,25) FENERBAHCHE (17,0) ZALGIRIS (4,40)



21.00: (1.15) BASKONIA (15.0) BAJERN (3.05)



9pm: (1.17) REAL MADRID (20.0) ALBA (5.50)


Hurry up, because by 6pm you can edit yourself with this ticket at your nearest MOZZART, or secure it through the mozzartbet.com application. The choice is up to you, so don't hesitate - BECOME A EUROLEAGUE DECISION!





* Odds are subject to change
